mapper.select: SELECT id, way_code, name_cn, name_en, way, piece_upper_carry, total_upper_carry, small_cargo_carry, big_cargo_carry, bulky_code FROM count_way where id = #{id}
SELECT id, way_code, name_cn, name_en, way, piece_upper_carry, total_upper_carry, small_cargo_carry, big_cargo_carry, bulky_code FROM count_way where 1 = 1 order by id desc
